name: Cusco, Sacred Valley & Machu Picchu
description: Built by the Inca Pachacutec, Machu Picchu was declared a World Heritage Site and one of the seven wonders, by the breathtaking beauty that is based on its rugged geography. Amazed visitors and entranced scientists are visiting every year, Machu Picchu with its squares and precincts, welcomes them and filled with an incomparable admiration.
